oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1937: "Jefferson Davis Park"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 1937 flood; Jefferson Davis Park; parks; boats; Mississippi River;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Jefferson Davis Park bordered by Mississippi River flood waters with a sign advertising Graham Boat Company. Houseboats and the foliage from a flooded Mud Island are in the background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Memphis & Shelby County Room Photograph Collection
